Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Shawn Coveny
Summary: Grants retroactive membership in Tier IV of the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Shawn Coveny.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Shawn Coveny
